description:
Zoro and Brook introduce the past and present Four Emperors. They talk about what kind of power each Emperor has or had, their shining moments of greatness, how some were brought down, and how others thrive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kizamareru Rekishi! Gekidou no Shinkyuu Yonkou!
L`histoire est écrite. Les turbulents Empereurs !
Making History! The Turbulent Old and New Four Emperors!
Schreiben wir Geschichte! – Die furiosen alten und neuen Kaiser!
刻まれる歴史! 激動の新旧四皇!
